channel.title: My Throne of Lies Spreadsheet
channel.description:
I made this ToL spreadsheet to track things. Right now I only have a game log and a starting project on "Which Slot Is Evil the Most?". It will probably expand in the future, but I doubt this thing will have any relevancy in one week's time. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1j4ghROjP3wc0kvvoVBRVbdZ16RZaG_Y5PFJV2eke2Is/edit?usp=sharing
UPDATE: I have updated the sharing permissions. You can now leave comments! Give me feedback, ideas, your opinions on the King update. I will probably end up replying to your comments.
And as always, hail Mithras.

item.title: My Throne of Lies Spreadsheet

item.description:
I made this ToL spreadsheet to track things. Right now I only have a game log and a starting project on “Which Slot Is Evil the Most?”. It will probably expand in the future, but I doubt this thing will have any relevancy in one week’s time.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1j4ghROjP3wc0kvvoVBRVbdZ16RZaG_Y5PFJV2eke2Is/edit?usp=sharing
